glsa.title: Ettercap: Format string vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A format string vulnerability in Ettercap could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: Ettercap is a suite of tools for content filtering, sniffing and man in the middle attacks on a LAN.

description.p: The curses_msg function of Ettercap's Ncurses-based user interface insecurely implements formatted printing.

impact.p: A remote attacker could craft a malicious network flow that would result in executing arbitrary code with the rights of the user running the Ettercap tool, which is often root.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Ettercap users should upgrade to the latest available version:
